010package imagingbook.common.histogram;
011
012public class HistogramMatcher {
013        
014        public HistogramMatcher() {
015        }
016        
017        /**
018         * @param hA histogram of target image
019         * @param hR reference histogram
020         * @return the mapping function fhs() to be applied to the target image as an int table.
021         */
022        public int[] matchHistograms (int[] hA, int[] hR) {
023                int K = hA.length;
024                double[] PA = Util.Cdf(hA); // get CDF of histogram hA
025                double[] PR = Util.Cdf(hR); // get CDF of histogram hR
026                int[] fhs = new int[K]; // pixel mapping function f()
027
028                // compute pixel mapping function f():
029                for (int a = 0; a < K; a++) {
030                        int j = K - 1;
031                        do {
032                                fhs[a] = j;
033                                j--;
034                        } while (j >= 0 && PA[a] <= PR[j]);
035                }
036                return fhs;
037        }
038        
039        public int[] matchHistograms(int[] hA, PiecewiseLinearCdf PR) {
040                int K = hA.length;
041                double[] PA = Util.Cdf(hA); // get p.d.f. of histogram Ha
042                int[] F = new int[K];           // pixel mapping function f()
043
044                // compute pixel mapping function f():
045                for (int a = 0; a < K; a++) {
046                        double b = PA[a];
047                        F[a] = PR.getInverseCdf(b);
048                }
049                return F;
050        }
051}
